content: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <netcdf xmlns="http://www.unidata.ucar.edu/namespaces/netcdf/ncml-2.2" location="http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/thredds/dodsC/ebd">   <attribute name="Conventions" value="COARDS, CF-1.0, Unidata Dataset Discovery v1.0" />   <attribute name="title" value="GCOS/GOOS 10-degree Equivalent-Buoy-Density (EBD) by NOAA NCDC" />   <attribute name="source" value="NOAA National Climatic Data Center" />   <attribute name="summary" value="The Equivalent-Buoy-Density (EBD) is a combination of numbers of observations from buoys and ships, weighted by the SST noise levels from these observations - see the Reference section for details" />   <attribute name="Keywords" value="global climate onserving system (GCOS), global ocean observing system (GOOS), integrated ocean observing system (IOOS), observing system adequacy & requirements, sea surface temperature, air-sea interaction" />   <attribute name="references" value="http://ams.allenpress.com/perlserv/?request=get-abstract&doi=10.1175%2FJTECH1828.1" />   <attribute name="History" value="Ver 1.5" />   <attribute name="institution" value="NOAA National Climatic Data Center" />   <attribute name="Contact" value="Huai-Min.Zhang AT noaa.gov or Richard.W.Reynolds AT noaa.gov; phone: 1+828-271-4090" />   <attribute name="Data_Calendar_month" value="2014-11" />   <attribute name="Comment" value="The time in the netCDF should be the center of a calendar month, and chosen as Day 15 for all months for simplicity" />   <attribute name="_CoordSysBuilder" value="ucar.nc2.dataset.conv.CF1Convention" />   <dimension name="zlev" length="1" />   <dimension name="lat" length="18" />   <dimension name="lon" length="36" />   <dimension name="time" length="60" />   <group name="CFMetadata">     <attribute name="geospatial_lon_min" value="5.0" type="float" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lat_min" value="-85.0" type="float" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lon_max" value="355.0" type="float" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lat_max" value="85.0" type="float" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lon_units" value="degree_east" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lat_units" value="degree_north" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lon_resolution" value="10.0" />     <attribute name="geospatial_lat_resolution" value="10.0" />     <attribute name="time_coverage_start" value="2010-01-15T00:00:00Z" />     <attribute name="time_coverage_end" value="2014-12-15T00:00:00Z" />     <attribute name="time_coverage_units" value="seconds" />     <attribute name="time_coverage_resolution" value="2628610.0" />     <attribute name="time_coverage_duration" value="P0Y0M1795DT0H0M0.000S" />   </group>   <group name="NCISOMetadata">     <attribute name="metadata_creation" value="2015-03-19" />     <attribute name="nciso_version" value="2.2.2" />   </group>   <group name="THREDDSMetadata">     <attribute name="id" value="EBD_agg" />     <attribute name="full_name" value="PMEL/Equiv Buoy Density Agg." />     <group name="services">       <attribute name="opendap_service" value="http://ferret.pmel.noaa.gov/thredds/dodsC/ebd" />     </group>   </group>   <variable name="EBD" shape="time zlev lat lon" type="float">     <attribute name="long_name" value="Equivalent-Buoy-Density" />     <attribute name="units" value="Number_of_Buoys" />     <attribute name="_FillValue" type="float" value="-9999.0" />   </variable>   <variable name="zlev" shape="zlev" type="float">     <attribute name="long_name" value="height above sea level" />     <attribute name="units" value="m" />     <attribute name="_CoordinateAxisType" value="Height" />   </variable>   <variable name="lat" shape="lat" type="float">     <attribute name="long_name" value="latitude" />     <attribute name="units" value="degree_north" />     <attribute name="grids" value="uniform grids from -85 to 85 by 10" />     <attribute name="_CoordinateAxisType" value="Lat" />   </variable>   <variable name="lon" shape="lon" type="float">     <attribute name="long_name" value="longitude" />     <attribute name="units" value="degree_east" />     <attribute name="grids" value="uniform grids from 5 to 355 by 10" />     <attribute name="_CoordinateAxisType" value="Lon" />   </variable>   <variable name="time" shape="time" type="int">     <attribute name="long_name" value="Center Time of the Data" />     <attribute name="units" value="days since 2000-01-15 00:00:00" />     <attribute name="_CoordinateAxisType" value="Time" />   </variable> </netcdf>
